text: Ronald Reagan, the 40th President of the United States, ran for president four times: * Ronald Reagan presidential campaign, 1968, the failed campaign Ronald Reagan conducted in 1968 * Ronald Reagan presidential campaign, 1976, another failed campaign Reagan conducted in 1976 * Ronald Reagan presidential campaign, 1980, the successful election campaign Reagan conducted in 1980 * Ronald Reagan presidential campaign, 1984, the successful reelection campaign Reagan conducted in 1984
title: Ronald Reagan presidential campaign
